complaint.description: Telkom's service has deteriorated and there is no service at the shopping center sites. The customer is also unhappy about the removal of the chat with agent feature on the website.
complaint.suggestion: Provide better service at shopping center sites and reinstate the chat with agent feature on the website

meta.review_title: Bad to no more service from Telkom
meta.review_content:
Telkom has gone from bad service to no service. 
No service at the sites in the shopping centers anymore. Only sales sites

Used to be able to chat with agent on there website. No they have cancelled that
and one must deal with a Bot piece of **** software. 

Can anybody at Telkom please call me. the 081180 also refers you to a self help.
I have a case number. So there is no option for that.
